BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: COLEGIO DE EDUCACION ESPECIAL Y REHABILITACION INTEGRAL INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: CODERI IS A NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATION ESTABLISHED WITH THE PRINCIPAL OBJECTIVE OF PROVIDING SPECIAL EDUCATION AND REHABILITATION SERVICES TO CHILDREN YOUNGSTERS AND ADULTS WITH MENTAL AND PHYSICAL DISABILITIES. CODERI'S GOAL IS TO FACILITATE AND PROMOTE THE PHYSICAL EMOTIONAL SOCIAL AND VOCATIONAL DEVELOPMENT OF CHILDREN ADOLESCENTS AND ADULTS WITH MENTAL RETARDATION
IRS990.MissionDesc: CODERI IS A NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATION ESTABLISHED WITH THE PRINCIPAL OBJECTIVE OF PROVIDING SPECIAL EDUCATION AND REHABILITATION SERVICES TO CHILDREN YOUNGSTERS AND ADULTS WITH MENTAL AND PHYSICAL DISABILITIES. CODERI'S GOAL IS TO FACILITATE AND PROMOTE THE PHYSICAL EMOTIONAL SOCIAL AND VOCATIONAL DEVELOPMENT OF CHILDREN ADOLESCENTS AND ADULTS WITH MENTAL RETARDATION.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDING SPECIAL EDUCATION & REHABILITATION SERVICES TO CHILDREN YOUNGSTERS AND ADULTS WITH MENTAL AND PHYSICAL DISABILITIES OR INTELLECTUAL DISABILITY INCLUDING SPEECH THERAPY OCCUPATIONAL AND PHYSIOLOGICAL THERAPY AND SKILLS DEVELOPMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: | PartandLinenumber:,Explanation:| Part1Line3,The Organization publicized nondiscriminatory policy on its internet homepage and is available upon request in its administrative office. Always available during the whole year and during the interview and enrollment proceses.| Part1Line6,The Organization received contributions or assistances as described in the Schedule B - Schedule of Contributors.|

The original Form 990 as completed is submitted to the Executive Director for approval signature and filing. It is disclosed to the Executive and Financial Committee of the Organization's Board of Director.

No member of the Board of Directors may take action or in any way attempt to influence CODERI's activities or decision-making by prepending its financial benefits for him his family his business or organization in which he or she or his or her close family is involved. The volunteer shall bring to the attention of the Board any particular situation involved or may entail a conflict of interest. It shall immediately disclose the existence and nature of the conflict. This situation should be documented in the minutes of the relevant Board meeting. In the event of a conflict of interest that member shall refrain from voting on the matter where such a conflict exists or may exist. Close relatives of board members will not be allowed to be employed in CODERI. No member of the Board of Directors may disclose or share information discussed at Board meetings or conversations between members relating to matters discussed at such meetings unless expressly authorized to do so by the Board.

Francisco J. Martin Caso Executive Director and Key Employees - The Board of Directors are the body that evaluate the Executive Director and key employees for compensation purposes. Based on performance goal achievements and availability of funds principally unrestricted. Maria P. Burset Flores School Director - The Board of Directors are the body that evaluate the Executive Director and key employees for compensation purposes. Based on performance goal achievements and availability of funds principally unrestricted.
